mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Taylor, John A.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Irontown, Lawrence Co., Ohio [Irontown, Lawrence County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Taylor, John A. Patient Age: 33. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound right hip. Conical ball entered one inch below crest of illium [ilium] posteriorly 2 inches to right of spine near posterior supieror process of illium [ilium] bullet lodged. Location Wounded: In action at Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Discharged from service.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Taylor, John A.
Gun shot flesh wound right hip. Conical ball entered one inch below crest of illium [ilium] posteriorly 2 inches to right of spine near posterior supieror process of illium [ilium] bullet lodged
